skill.name: template-skill
skill.description: Replace with description of the skill and when Claude should use it.
skill.summary: Replace with description of the skill and when Claude should use it.

security_audit.summary: This is an official Anthropic template skill with no executable code. Contains only placeholder documentation that requires customization.

content.value_statement: A starter template for building custom Claude Code skills with proper structure and frontmatter.
actual_capabilities: Provides basic SKILL.md structure with frontmatter
Shows required fields for skill metadata
Serves as starting point for custom skill development
limitations: Contains only placeholder content that must be replaced
Does not provide actual functionality without customization
Lacks detailed examples or implementation guidance

use_cases.title: Creating New Custom Skills
use_cases.description: Use this template as a foundation when developing new skills for Claude Code to ensure proper metadata structure and formatting.

use_cases.title: Learning Skill Structure
use_cases.description: Study the template to understand the required frontmatter fields and basic organization of a Claude Code skill.

prompt_templates.title: Customize Template for New Skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Update this template skill with name: [SKILL_NAME], description: [DESCRIPTION], and instructions for [USE_CASE]
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting development of a new custom skill

output_examples.input: Show me the skill template structure
output_examples.output: The template includes SKILL.md with frontmatter (name, description) and a section for skill instructions to be added.

best_practices: Replace all placeholder text with actual skill information
Provide clear, specific descriptions of when Claude should use the skill
Include detailed instructions below the frontmatter
Use descriptive, kebab-case names for skill slugs
anti_patterns: Using the template without customizing the placeholder text
Providing vague or unclear skill descriptions

faq.question: What fields are required in the frontmatter?
faq.answer: The name and description fields are required in the SKILL.md frontmatter section.

faq.question: How do I use this template?
faq.answer: Copy the template, replace the name and description in the frontmatter, and add your skill's specific instructions below the frontmatter section.
